name: Ad-Dispatch
tag_list: augmented-reality, ar, 3d, animation, total-visual-recognition, marketing, advertising
overview:
Founded in 1999, Ad-Dispatch is a North-American leader in Augmented Reality (#AR). Always on the cutting-edge of technology, the company has evolved over the last 12 years into an interactive content creation powerhouse, recognized globally for their unique ability to integrate augmented reality technology into the marketing mainstream without sacrificing creative campaign objectives.

Ad-Dispatch has worked with North Americaâ€™s finest marketing agencies and big brands like Chevrolet, Mercedes and the Home Depot to create memorable and meaningful consumer experiences. Ad-Dispatch has been recognized by Profit Magazine as among Canadaâ€™s fastest growing companies in 2008, 2009, and 2010. The company is headquartered in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, Canada.

For more information , visit http://www.ad-dispatch.com or follow us on Twitter @addispatch
